page.title: 12 ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Unfortunately, Northampton has not achieved a notable reputation for artistic endeavour although a number of individual artists and craftsmen are beginning to make a reputation for themselves and the town. Every year artists have an opportunity to display and sell their pictures at the Abington Park open air Art Exhibition. At about the same time each year there is also the Northampton Show which takes place in Abington Park. Here local artists and craftsmen, both young and old, can enter for a whole range of competitive events from flower arranging to embroidery and model making. The Northampton Gallery displays a number of works of art throughout the year.
